pkgmetadata.longdescription: Logistic Regression // Perform posterior simulation for binomial and multinomial logistic regression using the Polya-Gamma latent variable technique. This method is fully automatic, exact, and fast. A routine to efficiently sample from the Polya-Gamma class of distributions is included based on Polson, Scott, and Windle (2013) doi:10.1080/01621459.2013.829001.
